column4: Hi, how are you ? faced screen brightness , now ok. any good clocks , though i see cairo-clock, as suggested here.
Nope, I am a huge fan of the default system one to be honest.
any good clocks there, as i need two clock with different time zone on desktop.
Open up Software Center and search "Screenlets" -- I think that might be along the lines of what you're looking for.
